author: PuzzledSam

changelog.release_notes:
-Support for Emery (Pebble Time 2)
-Took advantage of larger screen on Time 2 and added 4th ring.

You know, fixing bugs about sleep is hard to do when you're the one not getting sleep. So yeah, I changed the automatic averages again. I'll probably change them in the future again sometime, once I figure out a better system for what I'm doing.
Changed the way the average is calculated for total sleep minutes, the older method would return negative values and the average would be way off.
Just squashed a few bugs. Fixes the negative health percentage for users that have sleep seconds as one of their custom metric with automatic goals.
Fixed a bug where you could choose nothing for custom metrics in the config page.

Better layout for Diorite. Should be clearer and nice to look at.

Themes have been tweaked to be much clearer and less a mess.

Automatic Goals have been improved, once again. Will most likely stay the way they are for a while.

Time can not be configured to show under the Health percentage.

Each ring can be configured to contribute to the Health Percentage or not

And the biggest update, each ring be customized to show any of the available metrics in Pebble Health.
-------------------
Feel free to donate if you like the app, this helps me keep going. The donate button is found at the bottom of the configuration page.

Added support for Pebble 2 watches and OS 4.0! Once you receive your new watch you should be able to use the application.

Added App Glance that show progress. Although, it does not update in the background, I'm working on it. :P

Slightly redesigned interface with more curves. It looks prettier now.

EXPERIMENTAL: Automatic goals should be slightly improved. If they were better before, someone tell me. I'll change em' back.
Added the ability to shake to toggle between the different screens. Set this up in the configuration page.
Fixed a bug that caused goals not to update on the current screen, once they where changed in the settings, until you pressed either up or down on the Pebble.

Redesigned interface. It's mostly the same with a few tweaks.

Goals are now displayed under the current value for a specific metric.

Goals can now be set automatically instead of specifying them in the settings. (Check the app's configuration page on your phone)

Language options were temporarily removed from the configuration as they didn't do anything yet and could cause confusion.

-Configuration page should work better with the latest version of Clay.
-Added vibrations to let the user know configuration has been received, or the user pressed the select button and it updated the health data.

-Customizable interface colours
-Optimized colors in default theme

-View each individual metric using the Up and Down buttons on the watch.
-Force data to update by pressing Select.
-Preparation for customizable interface colours.
-Battery consumption reduced and bugs fixed.

Don't forget to leave suggestions and questions on puzzledapps.weebly.com!
Fixed a bug where the sleep ring would not show up until you saved in the configuration page.

http://puzzledapps.weebly.com/activity.html
is the new website page for Activity.

Health percentage now waits until each ring has made a full circle at least once before going over 100%.

Each ring can only contribute to 1/3 of the Health percentage unless each ring has done at least one full circle.

Once you go over your goal and fill the ring, a darker ring will appear under while a new one starts.

Each goal is now customizable through the configuration page on the phone. (Works offline unlike most other config pages).

Initial release

Shows your active calories, active minutes and sleep minutes with a total completion percentage called "Health"

Customization coming soon.

description:
Display your activity (and sleep) and receive a "Health" percentage.

The "Health" percentage gives you a completion percentage of all three rings combined.
--------------------
The red ring, shows you your active calories burned. (Default goal of 300 active calories)

The green ring, shows you your active minutes. (Default goal of 60 minutes or 1 hour)

The blue ring, shows you your sleep minutes. (Default goal of 480 minutes or 8 hours)
--------------------
Each goal is customizable with rings that go darker when goal is met.
